nodes.text: The Pnakotic Coast was an area of coastline on the planet Savareen. Both the Bis Refinery and the Pnakotic Coast village were located on the Pnakotic Coast.

The Pnakotic Coast first appeared in the 2018 Anthology movie Solo: A Star Wars Story, and was first identified in Solo: A Star Wars Story The Official Guide. In the script for Solo, the area was named the Pnakotic Dunes as a nod to H. P. Lovecraft.
